about_the_game:
Bring festive spirit to the streets of Barcelona with your customised taxis!

What you get in this DLC:

• 3 Christmas-themed skins - Celebrate the end of the year by decorating your taxis with these enchanting glow-in-the-dark skins.

• 3 warm cabins - Make your customers feel welcome with these magical interiors featuring new upholstery colour schemes.

• 3 winter-themed hubcaps - Ice crystal, snowflake or toy: choose your own hub cap style to wow your passengers!

• 3 delightful dashboard decorations - Add a touch of good cheer to your dashboard, with a plastic duck in winter gear, a trio of festive pals (Santa Claus, the Snowman and Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer), as well as a figurine of Santa Claus holidaying on the beaches of Barcelona.

• 1 colourful gearstick - Change gear in style with this Christmas bauble knob!

• 1 luminous taxi sign – Light up your sign with festive garlands this holiday season, for an even more magical effect!
detailed_description:
Bring festive spirit to the streets of Barcelona with your customised taxis!

What you get in this DLC:

• 3 Christmas-themed skins - Celebrate the end of the year by decorating your taxis with these enchanting glow-in-the-dark skins.

• 3 warm cabins - Make your customers feel welcome with these magical interiors featuring new upholstery colour schemes.

• 3 winter-themed hubcaps - Ice crystal, snowflake or toy: choose your own hub cap style to wow your passengers!

• 3 delightful dashboard decorations - Add a touch of good cheer to your dashboard, with a plastic duck in winter gear, a trio of festive pals (Santa Claus, the Snowman and Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer), as well as a figurine of Santa Claus holidaying on the beaches of Barcelona.

• 1 colourful gearstick - Change gear in style with this Christmas bauble knob!

• 1 luminous taxi sign – Light up your sign with festive garlands this holiday season, for an even more magical effect!
